name: Oil Tycoon 2 -Gold Clicker Inc
description:
Enjoyed Oil Tycoon? You’ll love Oil Tycoon 2 ! Become an Oil Tycoon by managing your oil wells and your idle profit!

The turmoil history starts when you find an oil field in the ocean / sea. You will be developing, purchasing new equipment, erecting new buildings, hiring guards, personnel, making deals with competitors, acquiring the skill of stock trading, buying new possessions and many other fun things. In this incremental or idle game, you can build your oil empire as you see fit. Increase your investments, invest in new technologies. Drill & pump the oil to the surface, build trucks and sell at the best price to the oil refinery or store it to your oil wells waiting for future better prices. If you ever wanted to become a millionaire - nay, a billionaire? Well, you have the chance to live that story now by starting a oil mining empire! Simply click on oil driller to mine it and then buy upgrades as you earn more money and overtake the world’s billionaires to be the first trillionaire of all time.
Extract Oil from Sea / Ocean and deliver it to the turmoil destination point with the help of different massive techniques and have fun playing Oil Tycoon 2!

Construct the oil platform as fast as possible to earn more and prosper! Start the crude oil rig drilling process and build the petroleum mining tycoon business. You are welcome to the world of crude oil mining and shale oil drilling in which you will learn the process of shale oil extraction factory from the drilling of oil shale.

This fun turmoil like oil clicking idle game let's you experience the joy of being an entrepreneur and starting a massive oil mining empire from the safety of your phone screen. Tap oil drills to mine and use the money you earn to buy upgrades and invest in new equipment, manage operations, all while watching your camp spring to life around you. Be careful of FBI though - they will want to steal your oil tycoon fortune! Crude oil refinery process will also be done in this petroleum mining factory. Build your very own oil idle miner tycoon business in this oil mining craft game. Idle oil miner extraction will give you the real time experience of the whole oil drilling mining process. Use different kinds of drilling rig machines for shale oil mining extraction. Expand your shale oil refinery tycoon by earning profit through the mine tycoon business.

Oil Tycoon 2 offers unique factory sim factory building options and allows you to expand from a single oil drill into a million dollar all-round oil extraction platform on sea.

HOW TO PLAY
• Click to extract oil and collect money from ocean / sea
• Improve your industry: hire more employees, new equipment and upgrade them all!

Features:

* Fun, simple, tap tap, idle clicker game
* Hundreds of upgrades and achievements means you always have something to look forward to.
* Complete different missions to win bonuses and speed up the oil platform construction right in time!
* Mine Oil to earn money
* Earn upgrades to mine faster and earn more money!
* Build your mining base city factory
* Automate your workflow to increase your idle income
* Get idle cash, even when you are offline
* Profit from a smart investment or two to boost your economy
* Get Reputed and increase your reputation to make more money
* Manage operations of the company
* Prestige feature to reset your progress and bump your game up to speed up progress even faster
* Distribute oil to different territories, manage operations and make extra money from oil wells
* Awesome cool interactive elements for maximum fun
* First hand simulation for becoming an Oil Tycoon
* Invest in black market and pray that FBI doesn’t knock on your door
* Expand from 1 oil driller to several different buildings and become the best Oil Tycoon you can be!

Are you fast enough to start the most successful oil mining business of all time? Yes you are!

If you have the skill, become the richest entrepreneur of all time!
